subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Bears, facing a 21-point fourth-quarter deficit against Texas Christian, scored 24 unanswered points in the last 11 minutes, including a field goal as the clock expired, to win, 61-58.
snippet: The Bears, facing a 21-point fourth-quarter deficit against Texas Christian, scored 24 unanswered points in the last 11 minutes, including a field goal as the clock expired, to win, 61-58.
